ingredients: 1  ripe mango, 1 (18.25 ounce) box yellow cake mix, 3  eggs,   +   1/2 cup water,   +   1/4 cup vegetable oil, 2 tablespoons lime zest
nutrition: Total Fat 12g 15%, Saturated Fat 3g 13%, Cholesterol 50mg 17%, Sodium 308mg 13%, Total Carbohydrate 57g 21%, Dietary Fiber 1g 3%, Total Sugars 41g, Protein 4g, Vitamin C 5mg 27%, Calcium 68mg 5%, Iron 1mg 5%, Potassium 76mg 2%
